content:
The Vlocity Cards Framework provides a set of tools to build customer-centric, industry-specific UI components and applications on the Salesforce platform. Create dynamic and engaging omni-channel customer experiences with cards.

Cards are containers for a related group of information. They display Salesforce object information along with discrete, clickable actions that change according to the context in which they appear and based on the information that they contain. Build interfaces with Salesforce specific or external data sources.

The Vlocity Cards Framework features a card designer, a declarative tool used to build cards. Add content to states and create conditions for any state to determine what content displays when. Accelerate incremental development by previewing and testing your interface with actual data from a live Preview tab.

Beginning with Vlocity Health and Insurance Summer '19, Vlocity supports Salesforce's Lightning Web Components programming model with Vlocity Lightning Web Components.

The Classic Card Designer requires some coding to customize interfaces. Design and layout of cards are determined by templates that can be modified in the Template Designer if Angular, or extended in a local development environment if LWC enabled.

FlexCard Designer allows building cards without code using a drag interface and WYSIWYG editing. Drag elements onto a canvas to build the layout of your card and style individual elements with GUIs built into the designer.

FlexCards display Salesforce object information along with distinct, clickable actions that change according to context and based on information they contain.

Classic Cards are UI components rich in information and actions relevant to customer's context. Classic Card Designer is a declarative tool to create cards and card layouts with minimal HTML, CSS, and AngularJS coding.

Backward Compatibility Support for Passing Page Params allows passing page parameter to a Lightning page using a namespace prefix.

Cards Caching loads data from the VlocityMetadata partition of the Platform Cache when the card is active and viewed from a record page or community page. You can clear, enable, or disable user session cache and specific types of data from the Platform Cache.

Enable and Disable Data Sources allows enabling and disabling data source types for an org, profile, or user level from the Card Framework Configuration custom setting.

A Customer Story is a history of events for an Account or a Contact. It displays a timeline of all interactions with the customer in a single, chronological feed.
title: Vlocity Cards Framework
